name: HellBot Music
description: A telegram voice chat music player officially from The HellBot.

LOGGER_ID.description: A private channel/group id starting with -100

API_ID.description: Fill your api id from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Fill your api hash from my.telegram.org

SUDO_USERS.description: User id of some user(s) you want to give sudo access. Separate each userid with a space.

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Maximum duration in minutes to download music. Default is '60'

DATABASE_URL.description: Get a mongo db url and paste it here.
